bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Ohio County was created in 1776. It was named for the Ohio River. Ohio County was one of the fifty western Virginia counties to form the state of West Virginia in 1863.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Loyalty oath, 1861, signed by Reuben Finnell to support the pro-Union government in Wheeling, Virginia.
